---
title: "About"
---

I am a researcher at the Rechtswissenschaftliche Fakultät, University of Zurich, Switzerland.

I currently study judridical bodies like the [European Court of Human Rights](https://echr.coe.int), the [Institute für geistiges Eigentum](https://www.ige.ch/), [Sozialversicherungsgericht Zürich](https://www.ige.ch/de.html) and the [Swiss Bundesgericht](https://www.bger.ch/index.htm) using statistical tools, machine learning methods and text mining. Besides this, I develop Software for computer aided coding of text data using R.

I am a contributer to the R-package [spam](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/spam/index.html), which implements matrix algebra for high dimensional sparse matrices.
